Articles.Content: Terrified of the nothingness, you run down to floor 106. Here, you see a small red container. Something in the back of your mind tells you it contains everything, and to open it would destroy everything.
You then jump back up to floor 107, wanting to die. Yet in there, you find... A plant.
the plant tries to eat you, you run back down to floor 106 and take the container-o-everything with you.
Running into floor 105, you find a black hole, witch sucks you in, and you die... atleast you thought. You somehow appear back on floor 106, where you find a pretty woman with sunglasses.
you put her inside your bottle-o-everything and go back down to floor 105 where you find a langolier
You rush down to floor 104, trying to get back to ground level. You find a beachball.

After 6 months of delivering, you reach the conclusion its only a beach ball and start playing with the girl of floor 106, and the beachball.

Edited April 19, 2013 by RawChicken
You go to 103, trying to find the beachball that fell down the stairs.
You get bored eventually and then you find a portal gun. You abuse it to go to level 9001.
You go to floor 102, and find Bruce Willis. He gives you a machine gun.
You go to floor 25000, at that ttime your are in space but the atmosphere inside the skyscraper keeps your from dying.
You go up to floor 456,121. but realize that the building is not a planet and has no atmostphere!

You jump down to floor +1.

You make a crater down to floor -568,000
You proceed to floor one to stop the cheating, where the thread is revived.
